channel.title: Congratulations Patrick! (adrelanos)
channel.description:
Just want to give a public shout out to Patrick for his continued hard work on developing Whonix and his recent bravery in opening up his real identity to the world.
Thank you, Patrick!
Whonix is a worthy innovation in the Tor/Anonimity sphere.
Looking forward to seeing more from you out there (speaking maybe) as Whonix grows. :)

item.title: Congratulations Patrick! (adrelanos)
item.dc:creator: anonuser
item.description:
A most secure and highly flexible OS! Thanks!

Read full topic
